page.title: 05SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY
page.content: A majority of factories have had new machines installed recently and have plans for modernization and expansion. One of the factories in our D-Block went bankrupt recently and they now have plans to make a leisure centre for all age groups.The factories are all expanding and buying new machines and computers to help with all the work.That is why the unemployment figures are so high. PROGRESS ON THE FARM Artificial fertilisers are a concentrated means of adding food to the soil for extra crops.They consist of three units nitrogen,phosphate and potash.Farmers can buy different formulations for various jobs e.g.straight nitrogen for early grass and 22.11.11 for late grass. Farmers used to use just manure. Now they use both.
